# Student Performance Prediction System - Git Ignore File
# Prevents committing unnecessary files to version control

# Virtual Environment
venv/
env/
ENV/
.venv/
venv/

# Python cache
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class
*.so

# Generated files
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd
.Python
build/
develop-eggs/
dist/
downloads/
eggs/
.eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
*.egg-info/
.installed.cfg
*.egg

# Generated outputs (you may want to commit these)
model_evaluation_plots.png
student_performance.csv

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# Testing
.pytest_cache/
.coverage
htmlcov/

# Environment variables
.env
.env.local

# Logs
*.log

# OS generated files
.DS_Store

._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
